abstract: The biotech giant Amgen is near a deal to buy Onyx Pharmaceuticals, a maker of cancer-fighting drugs, for about $125 a share, people briefed on the matter said on Saturday.
snippet: The biotech giant Amgen is near a deal to buy Onyx Pharmaceuticals, a maker of cancer-fighting drugs, for about $125 a share, people briefed on the matter said on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Updated, Aug. 25, 7:38 p.m. | Amgen announced on Sunday that it has agreed to buy Onyx for $125 a share.

headline.main: Amgen Said to Be Near Deal to Buy Onyx for $10.5 Billion
headline.print_headline: Amgen Is Said to Be Near a $10.5 Billion Deal to Buy Onyx

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Andrew Pollack
